subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi set up Ángel di María for the game’s only goal as Argentina defeated Switzerland, 1-0, to advance to the World Cup quarterfinals.
snippet: Lionel Messi set up Ángel di María for the game’s only goal as Argentina defeated Switzerland, 1-0, to advance to the World Cup quarterfinals.
